name: Grapher Graph File
summary: Learn about .GCX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The Grapher program is located by default in the /Applications/Utilities folder.

description: 2D or 3D graph created with Grapher, a graphing program included with Mac OS X; can create graphs from standard, logarithmic, and polar equations; includes zooming and animation capabilities.
